reviewtext: Solid switch.  Works with my llinux-based computer where one of those green switches didn't.  I read that the power connector was short and would disconnect.  I find no truth to that though I'm not yanking on it all the time.  Also, doesn't feel hot at all which is something else that I've read about this switch,
summary: Great switch.  Works on a linux-based PC (Ubunut) where a Trendnet switch didn't
